competitors.name: Melio
competitors.notes: Small business bill pay platform, identified as a top competitor

competitors.name: AvidXchange
competitors.notes: AP automation platform with niche industry integrations

competitors.name: Tipalti
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused AP platform with global payment capabilities

competitors.name: Stampli
competitors.notes: AP automation platform founded in 2015, centered on accounts payable with invoice-centric workflows

competitors.name: Billtrust
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in accounts receivable and payment processing

competitors.name: Zoho Books
competitors.notes: Cloud-based accounting software with AP/AR capabilities

competitors.name: FreshBooks
competitors.notes: Cloud accounting software for small businesses

context: In 2020, Bill.com completed a significant milestone by going public via IPO in December 2019 on the NYSE and moved its headquarters to San Jose, California in early 2020. The company raised $1.15B in a Post IPO round in November 2020. By this time, the AP automation market had matured significantly with multiple specialized competitors. Bill.com positioned itself as a comprehensive cloud-based platform for small to mid-sized businesses.
